abstract: Dow Chemical‘s deal to buy Rohm and Haas isn’t likely to become a redux of Huntsman‘s saga with Hexion, The Deal Professor says.
snippet: Dow Chemical‘s deal to buy Rohm and Haas isn’t likely to become a redux of Huntsman‘s saga with Hexion, The Deal Professor says.
lead_paragraph: The markets are full of speculation this week about the fate of Dow Chemical‘s $15 billion deal to buy Rohm and Haas.
